creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: torque with three rings decorated with image of sun at center and a dragon and fish on either side of the center sun; rings end in diamond shape with circles and lines decorating them; connecting piece is two wired decorated with three cones made from twisted wire; tiny circles and half circles decorate edges of each hoop
inscription:
on third ring, on back
No.1813
title: Torque
